ShortInfo.landmark__battledia: Battledia Quests are unique quests that can be accessed through a Trigger Portal
ShortInfo.landmark__cocoon: Cocoons are smaller challenges designed to test players
ShortInfo.landmark__mag: By giving gathering materials to a Region Mag, you can improve the boosts that Region Mag gives to players in the current region, as well as level up your own personal boosts
ShortInfo.landmark__ryuker: Ryuker Devices can be used for several purposes, including changing Blocks, accessing your Storage remotely, creating Quick Food, moving to different Rooms, and quick travel
ShortInfo.landmark__tower: Towers are larger challenges, more complex quests similar to "Time Attack" quests from PSO2
ShortInfo.landmark__urgent: Urgent Quests are special Quests that can occur several times a day and can only be accepted during the time period it occurs
ShortInfo.mineral__dualomite: Used for various purposes like unlocking Potentials and Limit Breaking at the Item Lab
ShortInfo.mineral__monotite: Used for various purposes like unlocking Potentials and Limit Breaking at the Item Lab
ShortInfo.mineral__photonChunk: Used for various purposes like unlocking Potentials at the Item Lab
ShortInfo.mineral__photonQuartz: Used for various purposes like Multi-weaponization at the Item Lab
ShortInfo.mineral__photonScale: Used for various purposes like exchanging capsules at the Item Lab
ShortInfo.mineral__tetracite: Used for various purposes like unlocking Potentials and Limit Breaking at the Item Lab
ShortInfo.mineral__trinite: Used for various purposes like unlocking Potentials and Limit Breaking at the Item Lab
ShortInfo.food__aelio_crab: Increases HP / Increases weak point damage
ShortInfo.food__aelio_pear: Increases PP / Increases weak point damage
ShortInfo.food__aelio_tomato: Damage Resistance / Increases weak point damage
ShortInfo.container__gold: Contains valuable items like minerals or Alpha Reactors
ShortInfo.container__red: Contains very valuable items like Meseta, Star Gems, Units, etc.. Each container can only be broken once per account.
ShortInfo.other__alphaReactor:
Can be converted to 3500 N-Meseta. 
14 Alpha Reactors will spawn in various locations in the Aelio Region every day.
ShortInfo.other__datapod: Datapods contains a some messages by residents of Halpha
ShortInfo.other__stellarSeed:
Can be converted to 2000 N-Meseta. 
10 Stellar Fragments will spawn in West Retem every day.
ShortInfo.other__veteran: Dread Enemies, better known as Veterans, are stronger high level versions of bosses that will only spawn in specific areas.
ShortInfo.other__stellarGrace: Stellar Graces are part of World Trial. The objective of the World Trial is to gather all the pyramidal containers known as Stellar Graces hidden in each exploration sector.
ShortInfo.other__musicPlace: Places that play music from older games of the Phantasy Star franchise.
